panels.dialogue: Pocky: "They have the True Lenses!" Malrik: "And the frozen iron!" Prismor: "They're going to corrupt the Dawn's Crown alignment!" Lunara: "We have to stop them!"
panels.location: Everpeak Citadel interior corridors - white stone hallways with high vaulted ceilings. Ancient high elven architecture with elegant arches and carved pillars. Magical lanterns providing warm light. Winter decorations (festival ribbons, banners). Spacious wide corridors. Medieval fantasy castle interior with high elven craftsmanship.
